\subsection{Detailed Description}
Tukey Cost Function. 

If e$^\wedge$(1/2) $<$ d rho(e) = delta2(1-\/(1-\/e/delta2)$^\wedge$3)

else

rho(e) = delta2 

Definition at line 98 of file robust\+\_\+kernel\+\_\+impl.\+h.
